Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit
Texts.Alumni:Event:004: Agenda item date is outside the event's date range.
Texts.Alumni:Event:006: Invalid fee amount specified. A paid event must have a fee greater than zero.
Texts.Alumni:Event:007: Fee amount must be zero for free events.
Texts.Alumni:Event:008: Start time must be before end time.
Texts.Alumni:Event:009: At least one timeslot must be defined before publishing.
Texts.Alumni:Event:010: An event with this code already exists.
Texts.Events:InvalidSubscriptionDate: The deadline for subscription must be before or equal to the start time of the earliest timeslot.
